revised_title: Investigating the Volatilization of Salt of Tartar and Other Fixed Salts
tldr: The author, David von der Becke, explores the principles and causes of the volatilization of salt of tartar and other fixed salts. He discusses the role of fire and earthy particles in fixing and volatilizing salts, and proposes a natural method for volatilizing fixed salts through fermentation with crude tartar.
